text.60_Daf, 8_Line: father seeds the white from which [comes] bones . . .  his mother seeds redness from which [comes] skin and flesh . . .  and the Holy One puts in him spirit and n’shamah . . . ”
text.44_Daf, 13_Line: R’ Yan’ai ... [fetuses shaped like certain animals still count as human births if] “their eyes go in front of them like those of a human”
